design_system.name: GoGarvis Sovereign Architecture
principles: Function over Form: No decoration without purpose.
Raw Data: Expose the grid, expose the structure.
High Contrast: #FFFFFF on #000000. No soft greys.
Monospace Dominance: Headings feel like code/terminal.

rules: Use JetBrains Mono for all Headings and Data Values.
All labels and buttons must be UPPERCASE.
Line-height should be tight (1.1) for headings.

usage.primary: Use for active states, cursors, and critical alerts (Enforcement Layer).
usage.background: Void Black (#050505). Never pure black (#000000) to allow shadows if absolutely needed, but prefer flat.
usage.border: Dark Steel (#333333). Used heavily for grid lines.
usage.text: Pure White (#FFFFFF) for primary content. Grey (#888888) for metadata.

containers.dashboard_grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-px bg-border

rules: Use 'gap-px' with a background color of 'border' to create visible grid lines between items.
Sidebar navigation is fixed on the left (w-64).
Dashboard widgets should fill their grid cells completely.

buttons.default: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-none uppercase font-mono text-sm tracking-wider transition-colors
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-none uppercase font-mono text-sm tracking-wider
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-none uppercase font-mono text-sm tracking-wider

inputs.default: flex h-10 w-full rounded-none border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

cards.wrapper: rounded-none border border-border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-none
cards.title: text-2xl font-semibold leading-none tracking-tight font-mono uppercase

badges.default: inline-flex items-center rounded-none border border-transparent bg-primary px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2 text-primary-foreground uppercase font-mono

effects: Glow: drop-shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(255,69,0,0.5)] for active elements only.
Glitch: CSS animation on hover for logos/titles.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React (Stroke width 1.5px, sharp edges if possible)

rules: Hover states should be instant or very fast (100ms).

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to use the colors and fonts defined above. Set borderRadius to '0px'.
3. SHADCN OVERRIDE: Go into /components/ui and remove all 'rounded-md', 'rounded-lg', 'rounded-sm' classes. Replace with 'rounded-none'.
4. LAYOUT: Build the 'Architecture' page using React Flow or a custom SVG diagram overlaid on the 'architecture_diagram_bg'.
5. CHAT: The GARVIS AI chat should look like a terminal window (Green/Orange text on Black).
6. DOCS: The documentation browser should look like a file system explorer (Tree view on left, content on right).
7. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element has a data-testid attribute.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) ONLY for overlays, not main cards.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
